TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWcfReferenceReceiveContextInformation

summary.span: 定義要實作的介面，以取得其他的內容資訊。

span.span: Defines the interface to implement to obtain additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面可讓 WSDL 匯入工具 mechanismto 接收較佳的 proxy 產生和更佳的開發人員經驗在 Visual Studio 內額外的內容資訊。This interface enables the WSDL importer mechanismto receive extra context information for better proxy generation and a better developer experience inside Visual Studio. 如果 WSDL 匯入工具實作介面， `ReceiveImportContextInformation` WCF proxy 產生器的任何方法之前會先呼叫方法和稱為。If the WSDL importer implements the interface, the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method will be called by the WCF proxy generator before any methods of and are called. 額外的內容資訊是指傳遞給參數`ReceiveImportContextInformation`方法。The additional context information refers to the parameters passed to the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method. 參數包含的任何延伸模組檔案，以及實作的物件的參考內容介面。The parameters include the content of any extension files and a reference to an object that implements the interface. 傳遞給方法的任何延伸模組檔案僅供匯入工具，而且用來儲存任何所需的其他資訊。Any extension files passed to the method are specific to the importer and are used to store any additional information they need. 也就是 Visual Studio 不會控制這些檔案的內容，並不會直接使用它們。That is, Visual Studio does not control the content of these files and does not use them directly. > [!NOTE] > 匯入工具是指 WCF 擴充性機制。Importers refer to a WCF extensibility mechanism. 這項機制可讓您自訂的方式描述服務的中繼資料 (WSDL/XSD) 文件中產生 proxy 程式碼。This mechanism enables you to customize the way proxy code is generated from metadata (WSDL/XSD) documents that describe the service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WCF 延伸模組匯入自訂中繼資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310)MSDN 上。For more information, see [Importing Custom Metadata for a WCF Extension](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310) on MSDN.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReceiveImportContextInformation (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,byte[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveImportContextInformation(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, unsigned int8[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Sub ReceiveImportContextInformation (serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents As IDictionary(Of String, Byte()), serviceProvider As IServiceProvider)

public: void ReceiveImportContextInformation(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents
param.span: 提供與 WCF 服務參考 .svcmap 檔案相關之任何擴充檔的內容。

span.span: Provides the content of any extension files that are associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 向其查詢其他資訊之 Visual Studio 服務提供者的參考。

span.span: A reference to a Visual Studio service provider to be queried for additional information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents`參數會提供任何與 WCF 服務參考，例如 Reference.config 或已透過擴充功能加入自訂延伸模組檔案的.svcmap 檔案相關聯的延伸模組檔案的內容。The `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents` parameter provides the content of any extension files associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference, such as Reference.config or custom extension files that have been added through extensibility. > [!NOTE] > 從屬於 Visual Studio 服務提供者收到的任何介面將無法使用來匯入延伸，ASP.NET 組建提供者的內容中執行時。Any interface received from the service provider that is specific to Visual Studio will not be available to an import extension when running in the context of an ASP.NET build provider. 在 ASP.NET 專案中編譯 WCF 服務參考時，這是大小寫。This is the case when a WCF service reference is compiled in an ASP.NET project.
